about_the_game:
Unravel the Secrets of Dr. Wilfried Éric Herreshoff

Step into the shoes of a determined police officer investigating a chilling mystery in a small, storm-battered town. Reports of strange accidents and whispered rumors lead you to the Herreshoff Estate. But beneath the surface of his prestigious reputation lies a web of secrets darker than the storm outside.

In this atmospheric puzzle game, you'll explore the doctor’s meticulously preserved mansion, uncover cryptic diary entries, and piece together a story of desperation, obsession, and the haunting legacy of a family curse. What horrors has Dr. Herreshoff unleashed in his pursuit of a cure?

  • Immersive Storytelling: Discover the tragic tale of Dr. Herreshoff through his journals, family portraits, and eerie remnants of the past.

  • Tense Exploration: Investigate a rain-drenched mansion filled with unsettling details, hidden compartments, and cryptic clues.

  • Puzzle-Driven Gameplay: Solve challenging puzzles, navigate moral dilemmas, and uncover hidden truths about the Herreshoff family.

  • Atmospheric Design: Experience a blend of dark, brooding visuals and haunting soundscapes that pull you into the stormy night.

Wishlist Herreshoff's Legacy now and uncover the truth waiting in the shadows.
